You are a complete fool.  Look at the light bulb lighting up your (I presume jail cell) - you don't have a CLUE about what is going on with the physics behind it.

A 'black hole' appears black and round - just like the radio-photos that were taken a few years ago - that was your first mistaken comment.  Black Holes were proven to exist mathematically in physics - there is no getting around that - that was your second foolish remark because you don't understand either the science or the mathematics behind it.  Quasars are powered by Black Holes - something you probably have never heard of.  There are all sorts of galactic phenomena out there that cannot be explained without a Black Hole being behind them.  It would be better for you to just watch dumbfounded, rather that making comments on things you know nothing about.

The light is called an "echo," and the bend is a phenomenon that Albert Einstein predicted in his theory of General Relativity.   The U.S. and the world is very lucky Einstein and his research was for 'our side' and all of mankind.  Sets the bar for genius.

So much pseudo science in astronomy.  (Wait for the inevitable pile-on...)  We're told big-bang is more than theory as astronomists make new discoveries.  Okay.  Honest, straight question:  Then why can't they find a point of origin for the single event they declare created all this awe?  If everything is expanding away from that point as it has been for the stated claim of 13.7B years, it should make for simple triangulation to come up with an initial point of explosion.

Black hole gravity is said to be so powerful not even light escapes.  Then a black hole is graphically represented showing light/matter ejecting/spewing from polar(?) ends.  But we are told NOTHING escapes - not even light.  Is it just me or does the science seem to bend to make rationalizations supporting earlier claims, or any claim for that matter?

And now it's time for armchair astronomers to label me, call me names, say I'm an idiot (I won't claim otherwise), etc.
